levels.description: Attack Range <@ba.vup>+2</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>; heals <@ba.vup>{attack@max_target}</> targets and additionally heals the target or the friendly unit next to the target once for <@ba.vup>{attack@addition_heal_scale:0%}</> of the healing amount upon the original target; if the friendly unit to be healed is at 50% HP or lower, the healing amount is increased to <@ba.vup>{heal_scale:0%}</> of the original amount
